en.data_footnote: Offence key according to the national catalogue of criminal offences: Until 2016, offence key 232400 applied to physical harassment; from 2017, offence keys 232400 and 114000. Until 2016, offence key 132010 applied to sexual harassment; from 2017, offence keys 132010 and 115000.
